```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = F, 
  fig.retina = 3,
  out.height = '100%',
  out.width = '100%',
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE)

library(knitr)

root <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()
report_path <- file.path(root, ".report","fig")

```

## r project

include_graphics(
